dcterms:description: The dataset contains 30,000 facial images and corresponding semantic masks, covering 19 facial attribute classes, used for evaluating mask layout-to-image performance.
dcterms:title: CelebA-Mask

dcterms:description: COCO Stuff dataset includes thing and stuff classes in context, used for bounding box layout-to-image performance evaluation.

dcterms:description: Visual Genome dataset connects language and vision using crowdsourced dense image annotations, utilized for bounding box layout-to-image performance evaluation.
